definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: How many Baptists or Brethren does it take to change a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 更换一个灯泡要劳动多少个浸信会或者兄弟会基督徒？

sentences.english: The church contends that God is punishing the United States for its tolerance of homosexuality.
sentences.chinese: 浸信会声称上美国因允许同性恋而正遭受上帝的惩罚。

sentences.english: The building on the lower left is the main chapel.
sentences.chinese: 图示浸信会建于礐石的会址，左下方为该会礼拜堂。

sentences.english: He is a musician and church building committee member of Canaan Baptist Church.
sentences.chinese: 他是迦南浸信会的乐手及建堂委员会成员。

sentences.english: And even the most moderate Baptists are quite conservative.
sentences.chinese: 而且就算是最温和的浸信会成员也是非常保守的。

sentences.english: And you had Shiloh Baptist when you were in Sacramento.
sentences.chinese: 你在萨克拉门托的时候还有Shiloh浸信会。

sentences.english: I was raised a Southern Baptist, but wheah's Heaven, anyway?
sentences.chinese: 我家里都是南方浸信会教徒，可天堂到底在哪儿呢？

sentences.english: Main page for Little Rock Chinese Immanuel Baptist Church.
sentences.chinese: 小岩城以马内利华语浸信会主页。

sentences.english: Second, the members of the church “had the right to be where they were.
sentences.chinese: 第二，浸信会成员“有权利去他们到过的地方”。

sentences.english: ManyBaptist bosses are suspicious of all forms of glossolalia.
sentences.chinese: 许多浸信会大佬对各种言语不清的祈祷持怀疑态度。

sentences.english: The main nonconformist groups in England are Methodist, Congregational and Baptist.
sentences.chinese: 英格兰主要的新教群体有卫理公会，公理会和浸信会。

definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Hou4 qi1 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
related.word: 耶稣基督后期圣徒教会
